channel.title: Upgrading My PC / HELP
channel.description:
My Main goal in upgrading my system would be to play Arma II Dayz mod, these are my specs.
[img]https://encrypted-tbn2.google.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcSUQpDazoNN8vgd4CT_cQsFvCtLWqOGH5OX1NyMbldmykF9O-rK[/img]
Specs: [url=http://www.meetgadget.com/gadget/2766/eMachines+EL1331G-01w]eMachines EL1331G-01w specs (Meet Gadget)[/url] Only difference is I now have w7 ultimate
I am trying to upgrade it into a gaming computer, I was wondering if that is possible,
My goal is to add, [url=http://www.geforce.com/hardware/desktop-gpus/geforce-gtx-570]http://www.geforce.com/hardware/desktop-gpus/geforce-gtx-570[/url] thats the GPU
this is the new processor [url=http://www.starmicroinc.net/product/ADX250OCK23GQ/AMD-Athlon-II-X2-Dual-Core-Processor-250-30-GHz-4000-MHz-L2-2x-1MB-Socket-AM3-CPU-OEM/]StarMicro Inc. - AMD Athlon II X2 Dual-Core Processor 250 3.0 GHz 4000 MHz L2 2x 1MB Socket AM3 CPU OEM in Athlon Socket AM3[/url]
Please help me out, would I be able to to upgrade my pc with those two^?
And would I be able to game heavy, such as arma 2 dayz or another comparable game.
Thank you

item.title: Upgrading My PC / HELP
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

No point in upgrading that, it looks bad from a breif scan. Your going to need to upgrade it sooner or later so save up for a better pc.

Read full topic

item.title: Upgrading My PC / HELP
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

That’s an awfully powerful gpu for what you’re trying to accomplish.

Read full topic

item.title: Upgrading My PC / HELP
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

The link about what you have tells us absolutely nothing, but you’ll need a new motherboard for the AM3 socket, and you’ll probably need a better PSU as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Upgrading My PC / HELP
item.dc:creator: @texiz texiz
item.description:
@texiz wrote:

My Main goal in upgrading my system would be to play Arma II Dayz mod, these are my specs.

Specs: eMachines EL1331G-01w specs (Meet Gadget) Only difference is I now have w7 ultimate

I am trying to upgrade it into a gaming computer, I was wondering if that is possible,

My goal is to add,
http://www.geforce.com/hardware/desktop-gpus/geforce-gtx-570 thats the GPU

this is the new processor StarMicro Inc. - AMD Athlon II X2 Dual-Core Processor 250 3.0 GHz 4000 MHz L2 2x 1MB Socket AM3 CPU OEM in Athlon Socket AM3

Please help me out, would I be able to to upgrade my pc with those two^?

And would I be able to game heavy, such as arma 2 dayz or another comparable game.

Thank you
